nav.idea: From an idea to a project?

concept.title: The concept
concept.text: (Re)discover local stores on a large scale !
concept.text1: Are you looking for sustainable products Made in France - Made in Belgium, vintage items, fashion, jewellery or cosmetics and many other things?

local.title: Looking to shop local?
local.text1: Then you've definitely found the right place!
local.text2: Select the category of shops you are looking for and geolocate them on a map. Do you fall in love with a shop that you want to see on the app? Let us know.

discovery.title: Discoveries
discovery.text: Ready for a discovery shopping experience? First, we will show you the stores in Belgium and France. We will continue with Italy, UK etc... Follow the guide.

idea.title: From an idea to a project?
idea.text: Some time ago, we were looking for a gift. Walking in the center of Brussels, we passed by the window of the store Azur Elle. We walked through the door and were warmly welcomed by the owner.  He listened to what we were looking for. He found the perfect fit !
idea.text1: What struck us during our visit to Azur Elle: the small size of the store but a great originality, a choice and a personalized welcome !
idea.text2: The Shopisan application project was born from the fact that we were not aware of small shops, even those located nearby.

a.title: a. Right of access
a.text: In accordance with Article 15 of the Regulation, Shopisan guarantees the User the right of access to his/her personal data. The User has the right to obtain access to said personal data as well as the following information:
a.text3: The recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed, in particular recipients who are established in third countries or international organizations;
a.text4: Where possible, the intended period of retention of personal data or, where this is not possible, the criteria used to determine this period;
a.text6: The existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, as referred to in Article 22(1) and (4) of the Regulation, and, at least in such cases, relevant information about the underlying logic and the significance and intended consequences of such processing for the data subject

b.title: b. Right of rectification
b.text: Shopisan guarantees the right of rectification and deletion of personal data to the user.
b.text1: In accordance with Article 16 of the Regulation, incorrect, inaccurate or irrelevant data can be corrected or deleted at any time. The User shall first make the necessary changes himself from his user/other account, unless these cannot be made independently, in which case the request can be made to Shopisan.
b.text2: In accordance with Article 19 of the Regulation, the Controller shall notify each recipient to whom personal data have been disclosed of any rectification of the personal data, unless such disclosure proves impossible or would require disproportionate effort. The Controller shall provide the data subject with information about such recipients if he or she so requests.

c.title: c. Right to erasure
c.text: The User has the right to obtain the deletion of his personal data as soon as possible in the cases listed in Article 17 of the Regulation.
c.text1: Where the Controller has made the personal data public and is required to erase it pursuant to the preceding paragraph, the Controller shall, taking into account available technology and the costs of implementation, take reasonable steps, including technical steps, to inform other controllers processing such personal data that the data subject has requested the erasure by such controllers of any links to, or copies or reproductions of, such personal data.
c.text2: The two preceding paragraphs do not apply to the extent that such processing is necessary:
c.text3: To the exercise of the right to freedom of expression and information;
c.text4: To comply with a legal obligation requiring the processing laid down by Union law or by the law of the Member State to which the controller is subject, or to perform a task carried out in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in the controller;
c.text5: To establish, exercise or defend legal rights.
c.text6: In accordance with Article 19 of the Regulation, the Controller shall notify each recipient to whom personal data have been disclosed of any erasure of personal data or restriction of processing carried out, unless such disclosure proves impossible or would require disproportionate effort. The controller shall provide the data subject with information about such recipients upon request.

d.title: d. Right to limit processing
d.text: The User has the right to obtain the limitation of the processing of his/her personal data in the cases listed in Article 19 of the Regulation.
d.text1: In accordance with Article 19 of the Regulation, the Controller shall notify each recipient to whom personal data have been disclosed of any restriction on the processing carried out, unless such disclosure proves impossible or would require disproportionate effort. The Controller shall provide the data subject with information about such recipients if he or she so requests.

e.title: e. Right to data portability
e.text: In accordance with Article 20 of the Regulation, Users have the right to receive from Shopisan personal data concerning them in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format. Users have the right to transmit such data to another controller without Shopisan's interference in the cases provided for by the Regulation.
e.text1: When the User exercises her/his right to data portability pursuant to the preceding paragraph, she/he has the right to obtain that the personal data be transmitted directly from one data controller to another, when technically possible.
e.text2: The exercise of the right to data portability is without prejudice to the right to erasure. This right does not apply to processing necessary for the performance of a task in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in the controller.
e.text3: The right to data portability does not affect the rights and freedoms of third parties.

f.title: f. Right of objection and automated individual decision making
f.text: The User has the right at any time to object to the processing of his/her personal data due to his/her particular situation, including the automation of data carried out by Shopisan. In accordance with Article 21 of the Regulation, Shopisan will no longer process personal data unless there are compelling legitimate grounds for the processing that override the interests and rights and freedoms of the User, or for the establishment, exercise or defence of legal claims.
f.text1: Where personal data are processed for canvassing purposes, the User has the right to object at any time to the processing of his/her personal data for such canvassing purposes, including profiling insofar as it is related to such canvassing.
f.text2: If the data subject objects to the processing for canvassing purposes, the personal data will no longer be processed for these purposes.

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.text: The Site uses cookies to distinguish Users of the Site. This allows us to provide Users with a better browsing experience and to improve the Site and its content. The purposes and terms of cookies are contained in this section.

a.title: a. General principles
a.text: A 'Cookie' is a file deposited temporarily or permanently on the User's hard disk when consulting the Website, with a view to a subsequent connection. Thanks to cookies, the server recognizes the User's computer.
a.text1: Cookies may also be set by third parties with whom Shopisan collaborates.
a.text2: Some of the cookies used by Shopisan are necessary for the proper functioning of the Site, while others are used to improve the User's experience.
a.text3: The User can personalize or deactivate cookies by configuring his browser.
a.text4: By using the Website, the User expressly agrees with the management of cookies as described in this article.

b.title: b. Type of cookies and purpose
b.text: Different types of cookies are used by Shopisan on the Site:
b.text1: Technical cookies: they are necessary for the operation of the Website, allow the communication of data entered and are intended to facilitate the User's navigation;
b.text2: Statistical and audience measurement cookies: these cookies allow the recognition of the User and are used to count the number of Users of the Website over a certain period. Since they also indicate browsing behavior, they are an effective way to improve the User's browsing experience by displaying offers and suggestions that may be of interest. They also allow Shopisan to identify possible bugs in the Website and to correct them.
b.text3: Functional cookies: these cookies facilitate the use of the Website by retaining certain choices entered (for example, the user name or the language);
b.text4: Tracking cookies: Shopisan uses tracking cookies via Google Analytics to measure Users' interaction with the content of the Website and to produce anonymous statistics. These statistics allow Shopisan to improve the Website. Google supports the explanation of these cookies at: http://www.google.nl/intl/en_uk/policies/privacy/

c.text: Cookies are kept for the time necessary to achieve the purpose. The cookies likely to be stored on the User's hard disk and their retention period are as follows

d.title: d. Cookie management
d.text: If the User does not want the Website to place cookies on his/her hard drive, he/she can easily manage or delete them by modifying his/her browser settings. Browser programming also allows the User to receive a notice or notification when a Website is using cookies and to decide whether to accept or reject them.
d.text1: If the User deactivates certain cookies, the User accepts that the Website may not function optimally. Some parts of the Website may not be usable, or may be partially usable.
d.text2: If the User wishes to manage and/or delete certain cookies, he/she can do so by using the following link(s):
d.text4: If the User does not want Google Analytics cookies to be used, he/she is invited to set his/her browser to this effect at the following website: http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

limit.text: The website may contain links to other websites owned by third parties not related to Shopisan. Shopisan is not responsible for the content of these sites or their compliance with the Law and Regulations.
limit.text1: The holder of parental authority must give express consent for a minor under the age of 16 to disclose personal information or data on the website. Shopisan strongly advises persons exercising parental authority over minors to promote responsible and safe use of the Internet. The Data Controller cannot be held responsible for collecting and processing information and personal data from minors under the age of 16 whose consent is not effectively covered by that of their legal parents or for incorrect data -including data regarding age- entered by minors. Under no circumstances will personal data be processed by the Data Controller if the User specifies that he/she is under 16 years of age.
limit.text2: Shopisan is not responsible for the loss, corruption or theft of personal data caused by viruses or computer attacks.

security.title: 11. Security
security.text: The Data Controller implements organizational and technical measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the processing and collection of data. These security measures depend on the costs of implementation in relation to the nature, context and purposes of the processing of personal data.
security.text1: The Data Controller uses industry-standard encryption technologies when transferring or collecting data on the Site.
